interpretation:
The "sun behind rain cloud" card represents a period of mixed emotions. It signals that while you may feel hopeful and optimistic, there are still challenges and obstacles ahead. This card reminds you to stay balanced and patient, as the sun will eventually break through the clouds and bring clarity. It's important to remember that even in difficult times, there is still light and hope.

Overall, the "sun behind rain cloud" card is a reminder to stay positive and to keep moving forward, even when faced with challenges. The sun will eventually shine again, and your efforts will pay off. Trust in the process and stay hopeful.
